reviewText: Clearly this box set says region 2.so why write a review complaining about it honestly if you really must have these film's do what i did buy a Philip's dvd player and make it region free by watching a video online.or go buy a PlayStation 4 and y'all be set.no need to make thing's harder then what they are.when it's a simple fix.
Don't buy this if you live in the USA.  Doesn't work, read the fine print. Won't play.
